item.title: getting activity logs from azure
item.description: I was tasked with looking into how to connect to the Azure API using python. Below are some of my setup notes for getting this working. First install the az client. Follow this link to get things setup on your platform: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cli/azure/install-azure-cli?view=azure-cli-latest In order to create our client you can create a json file that contains the necessary credentials. This can be consumed by the python library. az login az ad sp create-for-rbac --sdk-auth > mycredentials.
